title: Foochow (1908) Eastern Min Bible
title_vernacular: Séng gĭng- Sĭng gô iók ciòng cṳ̆, Mìng-dĕ̤ng-ngṳ̄
description: Foochow Colloquial is the Min dialect spoken in and around Foochow, capital of Fukien Province. The Min dialects (derived from the Min River which flows through Foochow) are common to Fukien Province.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Min Dong Chinese
language.area: Fujian, Fu’an in northeast to Fuzhou in east central. Also in Brunei, Indonesia (Java and Bali), Malaysia (Peninsular), Singapore, Thailand, United States.
